segments.text: Oh honey , I tell you good news . The apartment I looked at today was pretty decent , around 120 square meters .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Great . What about the surrounding area ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Very quiet and safe . And it ’ s got a lot of trees and plants .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That ’ s good . Is the location easily accessible ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yep , it ’ s near a bus stop .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hmm . . . well , maybe we can buy this one then .
segments.speaker: S2
